구글 플레이 도서 및 참고도서 NO.1 으로 꾸준히 사랑받는 갓피플성경이 새롭게 업그레이드되었습니다! 기독교 어플 최초로 구글플레이 전체1위(2014.12.8~ 12.14), 앱스토어 전체1위(2014.12.5~12.11) ** 묵상기록과 성경통독을 돕는 갓피플성경 ** * 매일 업데이트 되는 풍성한 묵상자료, 찬송가사, 관련 말씀 영상이 제공됩니다. * 한번 구매로 안드로이드폰과 안드로이드 테블릿에서 함께 사용이 가능합니다. * 꾸준한 업그레이드와 쉽고 빠른 동기화와 백업! * 안드로이드폰 ↔ 아이폰 ↔ 테블릿(아이패드, 안드로이드 테블릿) 동기화 및 추가 구매한 역본을 함께 사용가능합니다. ★ 어플 설치시 참고 ★ ★ ▶성경어플 설치 후 최초 실행시 140M 크기의 성경DB파일과 글꼴(폰트) 파일을 다운로드 받습니다. - 성경데이터의 저작권 보호로 성경DB파일의 SD카드 설치를 지원하지 않습니다. - 정상적으로 성경DB파일이 다운로드 되지 않을 경우 성경본문이 보이지 않고 어플이 종료되는 현상이 있을 수 있습니다. 반복해서 문제가 발생하는 경우 어플을 삭제하고 구글플레이 스토어(안드로이드마켓)에서 다시 설치해보세요. (성경어플을 구매한 안드로이드 계정을 사용하고 있다면 재설치를 해도 결제가 다시 되지 않습니다. ^^ ) ▶ 갓피플 성경어플의 정상적인 설치를 위해서는 내장메모리의 프로그램 설치 가능공간이 300M이상 남아있어야 합니다. 공간이 부족할 경우 다운로드 또는 다운로드 받은 압축파일을 푸는 과정에서 문제가 생겨 정상적으로 설치가 되지 않을 수 있습니다. ▶구글 플레이에서 유료어플 첫 구매시엔 성경어플 금액외에 "$1.00가 결제됐다"는 문자를 받을 수 있습니다. 실제로 결제된 것이 아니라 구글에서 정상거래카드임을 확인하는 과정에서 발송되는 문자이니 안심하셔도 됩니다. (구글에서 테스트 결제후 바로 취소됩니다.) ▶갓피플 성경어플(안드로이드폰, 아이폰, 아이패드)에서 갓피플 로그인 후 한번 구매한 추가 역본(새번역,쉬운성경,NLT) 성경듣기(개역개정,쉬운성경)는 갓피플 성경어플(안드로이드폰, 아이폰, 아이패드) 어디에서나 추가구매 없이 사용이 가능합니다. ▶ 최소 설치 가능 버전은 안드로이드os 4.1(젤리빈) 이상입니다. = 묵상기록과 성경통독을 돕는 갓피플성경 특징 소개 = ◎ 특징 0 - 오직 갓피플 성경 어플에만 있다! 안드로이드↔아이폰↔아이패드 기기 동기화/백업 기능까지! 북마크, 묵상노트, 성경읽기표 기록까지 안전하게 보관되며, 추가 역본구매도 연동되어 한번만 구매하시면 기기를 바꾸셔서 계속 이용이 가능합니다. ◎ 특징 1 - 예수님 말씀 빨간색, 지명-인명 고딕 표시, 역본대조, 전체화면, 글자 크기와 종류, 줄/절 간격, 야간모드, 붙여읽기모드, 세례↔침례 설정가능 ◎ 특징 2 - 성경읽기표와 연동 / 성경본문 아래 (읽기표) 체크 기능, 기존 사용자를 위한 백업/복원 기능 제공 ◎ 특징 3 - 소셜 기능(페이스북, 트위터, 카카오톡, 카카오스토리, 에버노트, TXT파일 보내기) 복사기능 / * 목차검색 (초성 + 장/절까지 키패드 입력) ◎ 특징 4 - 간편한 북마크 / 원터치로 표시되며, 날짜별, 성경별 관리 가능 + 클립기능으로 설교본문을 빠르게 키핑해 보세요. ◎ 특징 5 - 형광펜과 마이노트 / 본문과 함께 볼 수 있으며 성경별, 날짜순, 키워드별로 쉽게 관리 가능 / 마이노트 검색 가능 ◎ 특징 6 - 효과적인 검색 / 성경역본별, 성경본문별 검색 결과, 두 단어 이상 함께 검색 기능, 성경그룹 열기 닫기 / 역본대조 기능 ◎ 특징 7 - 입체낭독 성경 듣기 서비스(개역개정,쉬운성경) - 구매필요 ◎ 특징 8 - 원하는 역본만 저렴하게 추가 구입 가능 (현재 '새번역', '쉬운성경', '우리말성경', 'NLT' ) 모바일웹을 이용한 다른 역본 확인 가능 ◎ 특징 9 - 알람 설정으로 성경읽기를 좀 더 체계적으로 할 수 있습니다. ◎ 특징 10 - 매일 업데이트 되는 풍성한 묵상 자료, 권,장별 관련 갓피플TV 영상과 컨텐츠 제공 ◎ 특징 11 - 찬송가사, 주기도문, 사도신경, 교독문 제공 - 개역개정, 새번역의 저작권은 대한성서공회에 있음. - 쉬운성경의 저작권은 (주)아가페출판사에 있음. - 우리말성경의 저작권은 (주)두란노에 있음. - 네이버 나눔글꼴의 지적 재산권은 NHN에 있음. - Holy Bible, New Living Translation, copyright ⓒ 1996, 2004, 2007 by Tyndale House Foundation. description: Learn Czech! - "Czech 50 languages" (www.50languages.com) contains 100 lessons that provide you with a basic vocabulary. This free app has 30 lessons. With no prior knowledge, you will learn to fluently speak short sentences in real-world situations in no time. The 50languages method successfully combines audio and text for effective language learning. 50languages corresponds to the Common European Framework levels A1 and A2 and is therefore suitable for all types of schools and students. The audio files can also be effectively used as a supplement in language schools and language courses. Adults who have learned a language in school can refresh their knowledge using 50languages. 50languages is available in over 40 languages and in approximately 1600 language combinations, e.g. German to English, English to Spanish, Spanish to Chinese etc. The 100 lessons help you to quickly learn and use a foreign language in various situations (e.g. in a hotel or restaurant, on a vacation, small talk, getting to know people, shopping, at the doctor, at the bank etc.). You can download the audio files from www.50languages.com to your mp3-player and listen to them anywhere - at a bus stop or a train station, in the car, and during a lunch break! To get the most out of 50languages, learn one lesson a day and regularly repeat what you have already learned in previous lessons.
release_text: All lessons are FREE after login.

description: Gogobot's Amsterdam travel guide is the best way to discover the coolest places to go in Amsterdam. Whether you're planning a vacation or simply exploring, Gogobot offers insider reviews and photos for the best hotels, restaurants, and places to go in Amsterdam. Named Editor's Choice on Google Play, and featured in New York Times Travel, Conde Nast Traveler, Travel + Leisure, CNN Travel, Huffington Post, Outside and more. Gogobot's Amsterdam City Guide offers the best personalized guide to Amsterdam. Amsterdam has a reputation for being somewhat of a wild city, given its legal recognition of both the sex and drug trades, but Amsterdam does have some tamer, and equally interesting attractions that draw just as much attention. As the capital city of The Netherlands, Amsterdam is a center for the arts and culture and has a scintillating history that many people often overlook. Although the Red Light District is vibrant (in its own way) and definitely worth walking through for bragging rights, other things to do include visiting the Van Gogh Museum, the Anne Frank Museum, the Rijksmuseum, (or national gallery), and the canals that form some of the city’s main thoroughfares. Restaurants here have recently improved, serving a new strand of Dutch food that has given refreshing new twists to traditional Dutch cuisine. Additionally, international influences have gained stature here and you shouldn’t be surprised to find yourself in a good sushi restaurant or even an Indonesian eatery. At night, head to one of the many bars or nightclubs, and join in the ruckus – Amsterdam really knows how to party! Not many cities in the world have as many layers as Amsterdam does, with its on-the-surface wild side and its deeper, more sophisticated side, offering interesting things to do for any type of visitor. The Amsterdam City Guide helps you discover it all. What users love about the Gogobot Amsterdam Travel Guide: ✓ EXPLORE Amsterdam to the fullest, with maps, reviews and photos. ✓ PLAN your next trip easily and discover where friends have been! ✓ BOOK a hotel on the go with just a tap. ✓ CREATE stunning photo postcards and reviews of places you've visited. ✓ GET INSPIRED with postcards and reviews by friends and travelers like you ✓ JOIN a community of passionate travelers from around the world. TRIBES Gogobot Tribes are communities of travelers who share common interests. Are you a trail-blazing jet-setter with an adrenaline addiction? The Adventure Tribe may be for you. Feel at home in high-end hotels in exotic locations? Check out the Luxury Tribe for great tips. Always on top of the latest local hotspots? The Trendsters Tribe and Nightlife Tribe is where you'll find your groove. With 19 Tribes, and more on the way, travel advice has never been more personal! POSTCARDS Share your experiences with your friends. Turn your photos into digital postcards and customize them with filters to make them look beautiful. You can share your postcards with friends via Facebook, Twitter, email or SMS. You can also browse beautiful postcards from around the world on the "Featured" feed. What users are saying: “Love this travel guide app, love the idea of tapping into my Facebook friend network for travel tips. Also love making postcards :)” – Paul, Australia "I used to use Frommer's and Lonely Planet - now I use Gogobot for my ultimate travel guide." – Erica, NYC "If you like TripAdvisor, Gogobot will blow your mind" – Michael Arrington, TechCrunch "Its like Yelp for travel!" - Connie, San Jose, CA

description: VERY FUN AND ADDICTIVE Bicycle runner game. Jump your way through the city without hitting the obstacles that aim to prevent you from having a super cool ride through the big city! Keep in mind that the world moves a little faster the farther you get...make the right moves and you'll stay alive!

In this SUPER ADDICTING jumper game, high flying Road Runner Rob has what it takes to be the best of all hopping birds. Use your best timing and judgment to clear the prickly and sandy obstacles for a chance to win the various crown and ultimately the recognition of all Robs fans. Hopping Birds all over the world try to win the Super Jump Crown and fail. Help Rob be the next hopping champion by giving your best sky high attempt to pass over as many obstacles possible. Kids and adults LOVE THIS GAME! It's a REALLY FUN game to play for everyone!

In this CRAZY FUN and SERIOUSLY SILLY circus craze themed challenge will have you playing over and over again! Use your skill and your best effort to harness Bozo's FUN BALLS when rolling the last remaining balls on earth into holes the for points and the ability to rule the festival of fun!

Playing this slot game is ABSOLUTELY ADDICTING and SUPER FUN! In this wild adventure where you've found yourself in the wonderful world of enchanted forests and magical surprise, you become richer than ever...or you can fall to the demise of the wicked witch and her stifling army of wing-backed monkeys! Beware but be swift in your journey to the big castle. You must get multiples of 2 or more of the same symbol and you will continue your journey through the extravaganza that awaits. This slot game is VERY FUN!!!

Escape Kill zone defenders that aim to eliminate your entire existence and take over the entire galaxy. Avoid defenders to remain in pursuit of the ultimate quest...total time domination. You have the ability to rule the galaxy by overcoming the obstacles that surround you and attack you in the kill zone. Help save the fate of the Gold Flash Racer civilization. Please enjoy for playing this game. :)

Find the hidden Jelly King's donuts In his attempt to crash the party, the infamous Jelly King challenges you to guess which donut is his. Keep a close watch and select the right donuts that are filled with bursts of jelly as you climb each level. Take your best guess as these silly shifting donuts pick up speed each time you outsmart the Jelly King. The Jelly King is tricky...so be extra keen each time you take on the challenge. These funny donuts are out of they're minds, dizzy and fresh from the oven. Don't let the Jelly King outsmart you with his moves.

Ride fast and avoid obstacles that aim to wreck your life by making you crash n burn hard. Help paperboy run his route as best you can while managing the cards that are weapons of destruction. Paper boy aspires to be the best he can be, however in order for him to do this he needs to successfully avoid everything that stands in his way. Stay alive longer by catching and using the power cards to punk those that aim to stop you in your tracks. In this game, the paper boy is done with his route and all he is trying to do is get home safely. This game is REALLY CHALLENGING AND FUN for all ages and you will ENJOY IT being a part of your collection!!

In this confined space you possess the world in your control! Carefully position your arch defenders to contain the infamous dragon droid and protect the fate of the world. This droid is a descendent of the Circle Noid Galaxy, and like others of his kind, he possesses a red matter agent that is capable of destroying an entire solar system!! He's sure to end the planet we love most, earth, as a result if his recent capture. Only you can ensure the safety of the human race...only you can help our people survive this horrible force sent to wipe our world off the grid through black hole warfare!! This game is a TRUE TEST of SKILL and in the same token can be SUPER ADDICTING and FUN!!

VERY FUN AND ADDICTIVE Snowboard runner game. Help Tonic leap his way through the trees without hitting the pests or obstacles that aim to prevent you from having a killer run through the winter landscape! Keep in mind that the world moves a little faster the further you get...make the right moves and you'll stay alive!

Young and free, this extraordinary turtle has taken his thirst for catching air to new heights. This handy application presents you several self-guided walking tours to see the best of the Amsterdam, Netherlands, and it comes with detailed tour route maps and powerful navigation features to guide you from one sight to the next. No need to hop on a tour bus or join a tour group; now you can explore all of the best attractions on your own, at your own pace, and at a cost that is only a fraction of what you would normally pay for a guided tour. Walking tours included in this application are: * Key Landmarks (8 sights) * Jewish Quarter (8 sights) * Western Canal Belt (9 sights) * Red Light District Secrets (6 sights) * Churches Tour (8 sights) * Museums Walk, Part 1 (6 sights) * Hottest Gay Clubs (6 sights) * Top Shopping (9 sights) * Museums Walk, Part 2 (8 sights) * Art Museums & Galleries - 1 (6 sights) * Art Museums & Galleries - 2 (6 sights) All the data used in this app is built into the software, so you can follow the walking tours or use the city map without internet access or cellular data plan. No need to pay the costly roaming charges when traveling to foreign cities. The app is optimized for Android phone and tablet. The powerful navigation assistance includes: * Touring routes clearly displayed on map. * Precise turn-by-turn walking directions from one sight to the next. * `FindMe` displays your exact location and Auto Tracking displays your movement on the map (this feature is not supported on device without built-in GPS function). * Built-in compass to show you the direction. * A detailed city map which can be used independently for your other traveling needs. Please visit our website at www.GPSmyCity.com to find city walks for over 470 cities worldwide.

description: Square - one of the most boring geometric shapes. Its all sides are equal, it has equal angles, you can even compute its area without any effort. But despite it all, it became the main character of addictive puzzle game. If you are bored by same old logic games, here is something new. Square Puzzle is addictive logic game, in which your goal is to fit all squares into shaded area matching their colors. Easy at first, it's quickly getting more challenging. Square Puzzle offers you 160 puzzles grouped in 10 gradually increasing difficult levels. This simple little game will make you addicted to your phone for days solving brand new logic puzzles. Square puzzle - new quality in logic games world

NonoCube is a challenging 3D puzzle game where players use logic to chisel away at puzzle cubes and uncover the secret objects hidden inside. Expanding on concepts from Sudoku and the "Japanese Crossword", NonoCube takes the classic nonogram puzzle into the third dimension to stretch your brain and challenge your wits! With NonoCube’s unique puzzle-creation technology, players will never have to guess to solve each of the game’s growing library of puzzles. If you love puzzle games like Sudoku, download NonoCube today! - No guessing ever! In NonoCube there are paths to solving every object. - Challenging puzzles, backed by a special algorithm that makes them difficult but also guarantees a logical move is always available. - In-game tutorials will guide you on your way to becoming a NonoCube master. - Over 10 hours of puzzles to solve, with more on the way! - First Platinum Pack (10 more hours of puzzles) is now available! We are currently hard at work bringing you even more puzzles; follow @nonocubegame on Twitter for release information and game updates. We also want to hear your thoughts! Send questions or suggestions for improvement either in-game or via email ( support@graycode.com ).

description: POP3 Refresh for Gmail is a one-click solution to refresh your external POP3 accounts in Gmail right from your phone! You can even automate it to refresh your accounts at an interval defined by you (e.g. every 10 minutes). Having Gmail pull emails from existing POP3 accounts is a nice feature. However, emails are usually fetched only once every hour. In addition, the mobile Gmail interfaces gives you no way of manually refreshing your accounts. So if you're expecting an important email on one of your external accounts, you'll have to wait - in the worst case - more than an hour before you'll receive that email on your phone. This is where this app comes in. Simply hit "Refresh Now" from the main menu (or from the provided widget) to automatically refresh your external accounts in the background! Each full refresh only takes about 5 seconds on WiFi and slightly longer on 3G. Note: You can of course exit the app (using the "BACK"-key) once you've started a refresh - it will complete the refresh in the background. Please note that each refresh uses about 200KB of data - make sure that you have an appropriate data plan before activing the "auto-refresh" feature!
release_text: v1.7: - Adapted app to a change in Gmail v1.5: - The app now works with 2-step-verification! v1.4: - Provides a fix for a recent change in Gmail v1.3: - Tapping the "Refresh running..."-notification now cancels the current refresh v1.2: - Bug-fixes for devices running Android <3.0 v1.1: - Ability to restrict auto-refresh to Wifi - Now showing a notification while refresh is running

description: TripView displays Sydney and Melbourne public transport timetable data on your phone. It features a summary view showing your next services, as well as a full timetable viewer. All timetable data is stored on your phone, so it can be used offline. Features: - View times for any saved trip with a single tap - Trackwork and service interruption information - Interactive maps (create your trip by clicking on your station/stop) - Alarms (arrival/departure, time/distance) - Multi-modal trip editor (customise exact change locations / lines) - Real-time delay information and vehicle map (subject to data availability) Realtime data is available for the following operators: - Sydney Trains (Sydney metro area only, excluding Waterfall and the T6 Line) - Sydney and Newcastle Buses - Hillsbus, Forest Coach Lines, Busways Blacktown, Transdev North Shore - Sydney Ferries - Sydney Light Rail (excluding stops between Exhibition Centre and Central) NOTE: Best efforts are taken to ensure timetable accuracy, but no guarantees are made. If you find an error in the timetable, please email contact@grofsoft.com with details.
release_text: - Fixed a bug where after reversing a trip, the list would sometimes not scroll to show the current time. - Fixes to support future real-time data.

description: GrooveMixer Pro is the real-time music beat sequencer for composing music grooves on your Android. GrooveMixer Pro is ad-free version of GrooveMixer app. To try FREE demo please go to this link: http://groovemixer.com/get/ This handy drum machine includes pattern sequencer, 8-channel step sequencer, pattern/channel mixer, sample list with file manager for importing WAV, AIFF, DS, OGG or FLAC sounds from your sdcard. GrooveMixer Pro is the great solution for music composers to make trap, hip hop, house, dubstep, RnB and other music tracks. This beat maker was created for mobile musicians wanted to sketch their music rhythm ideas everywhere. Product features: • Drum machine with 256 patterns • Volume mixer with mono\solo buttons • Stereo mode supported • Step sequencer with 8 channels • Piano roll mode to pitch instruments • Beats per minute (BPM): 20-400 • Friendly and easy-to-use interface • Save and load your groove beats • Export sound beats to audio WAV, AIF, DS, OGG, FLAC files • Sample preview before using in app • Samples are loaded from SDCARD • Classic TR-808, TR-909 and Linn drum kits • Unlimited song length • Support various time signatures • Built-in zip extractor to install downloaded sample packs • DrumSynth files can be imported Friendly and well designed user interface works good on small and large screens. This music creation tool works without any restrictions. Look our demos (songs/tracks) or read tutorials on http://groovemixer.com/tutorials/ site. GrooveMixer Pro is developed by Sergey Nikitin (Flexbyte Software) and published by Technology Improves the World Ltd under license agreement.

description: Photo Ruler is designed to accurately determine the size of any object by either taking a picture of it or measuring it on the screen. With its simple user-friendly design Photo Ruler allows you to measure things just as conveniently and precisely as with a traditional ruler or tape measure. ALSO AVAILABLE FOR IPHONE: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/photo-ruler-measure-and-label/id1020133524?mt=8 How to use: Method 1: Firstly, please ensure that the object you wish to measure and the object of known length (Base Item) are in the same picture. Double tap on screen to call settings. There is a predefined list of Base Items, including Debit/credit card and Quarter. Select the one you have. It is advised to use the Base Item which is closest in size to the object you wish to measure. Secondly, ensure that the Base Item and the object you wish to measure are in the same plane and the camera is (or was) parallel to them. This is necessary to avoid image distortions caused by the camera perspective. Align the Blue arrows against the Base item and Green arrows against the object you want to measure. The length of the object is shown in the top left corner of the screen. Method 2: Use screen as a traditional ruler. You can measure size of a small object by placing it on the device's screen and adjusting line limiters against the object. The size of the object will be show at the bottom of the screen automatically. If you see that ruler’s scale is visually stretched/ shrunken, you can reset calibration manually. On-screen ruler can be calibrated using different Base Items, including Debit/credit card or coin. Double tap on screen to call settings. Accuracy: Given that you have accurately aligned markers, you will receive a measurement that is as precise as when using a traditional ruler or tape measure.

Guobi Arabic Keyboard ( الوحة المفاتيح العربية ) Features: ◇ Guobi Keyboard supports smart input for over 50 languages. ◇ With multiple keyboard designs for each language, you may choose the keyboard which suits you best. ◇ With its smart-learning features, your favourite words, phrases, sentences and other typing habits will be learnt when you type. ◇ Auto word correction intelligently covers you when you mistype. ◇ For fast entry of symbols or numbers, just press on the letter keys and slide upwards. ◇ Keyboard height adjusts automatically to your screen. ◇ No personal information, such as passwords, credit card numbers and other privacy information will be learnt. The keyboard contains Arabic and English input modes only. If you need other languages, please search and install its keyboard individually. Please be awared that some of the languages are paid keyboards. Please be sure that Arabic font can be shown in your device. Here are the keyboard layouts available:Normal, Normal(R2L), Extended and Extended(R2L). VERY IMPORTANT! To enable the keyboard, go to "Language and keyboard" settings, and check "Guobi Keyboard" box. Then: - on Android < 3.0: long press in any text input area until a popup menu appears, select "Input Method" in this menu, and choose "Guobi Keyboard" in the list. - on Android > 3.0: pull the status bar while the keyboard is visible, and choose "Select Input Method", then "Guobi Keyboard" Languages available: Afrikaans Albanian -- Shqipe Arabic -- اللغة العربية Bangla -- বাংলা Basque -- Euskara Belarusian -- Беларускі Bulgarian -- български Catalan -- Català Danish -- Dansk Dutch -- Netherlands Estonian -- Eesti keel Farsi -- فارسی Filipino -- Tagalog Finnish -- Suomi French -- Français German -- Deutsch Greek -- Ελληνικά Hausa Hebrew -- עברית Hindi -- मानक हिन्दी Hinglish Hungarian -- Magyar Icelandic -- Íslenska Indonesian -- Bahasa Indonesia Irish -- Gaeilge Italian -- Italiano Kannada -- ಕನ್ನಡ Kurdish Kyrgyz -- Кыргыз Malagasy Malay -- Bahasa Melayu Mongolian -- Монгол хэл Nepali -- नेपाली Norwegian -- Norsk Pashto -- پښتو‏ Polish -- Język polski Portuguese Europe -- Português Portuguese South America -- Português Romanian -- Limba română Russian -- Русский язык Slovak -- Slovenčina Slovenian -- Slovenščina Spanish Europe -- Español Spanish South America -- Español Swahili -- Kiswahili Tamil -- தமிழ் Telugu -- తెలుగు Thai -- ภาษาไทย Turkish -- Türkçe Ukrainian -- Українська Uighur -- ئۇيغۇر يېزىقى Urdu -- اُردو‏‎ Uzbek -- U'zbek Vietnamese -- Tiếng Việt Zhuang

"Dollarbird’s awesome personal finance-tracker arrives for Android" - The Next Web Track and forecast your money as easily as adding events to a calendar! Dollarbird is your complete and flexible money handling tool that helps you put your money where it matters! It helps you: - find out what you spend your money on - make a plan and project how much money you’ll have in the future - get reminders for monthly bills and all this with a sleekly designed and familiar calendar interface. What’s the catch? Well, there isn’t any. Dollarbird is free to download and use, having really all the features you need to discover your spending habits, adjust them according to your future plans and see how your balance evolves over time. Did we mention the easy-to-understand charts by now? Dollarbird is not just an expense tracker, it’s your all-round perspective on where you stand now and where you’ll be standing in the future, financially. Dollarbird is your smart calendar for your personal finances. Main features ★ Simple calendar-based interface - Managing your money has never been this easy! If you can use a calendar, Dollarbird is your best choice. ★ Expense and income tracking - Easily add your transactions anytime, anywhere to reduce guesswork later on and be able to keep a budget. ★ Financial planning and automatic balance calculation - Add past or future income or expenses to the calendar, and your balance will be calculated automatically for each day, month or year. ★ Recurring transactions - Set up recurring transactions, like your salary or rent, for easy planning of your cash flow. ★ Sleek interface and chart design - See the breakdown of your past and planned expenses by category, your 5-year financial projection and more on a beautiful interface. ★ No registration or bank account data required. Read our Terms of Use: http://dollarbird.co/terms Read our Privacy Policy: http://dollarbird.co/privacy Help us improve this app for you, let us know your questions and suggestions at feedback@dollarbird.co . Built with care by Halcyon Mobile.

description: Holo Themer lets you force any app to use: Holo Dark Holo Light Holo Light with dark Actionbar Holo Dark with no Actionbar Holo Light with no Actionbar Wallpaper Wallpaper with no Titlebar Pure black Pure black - no actionbar Device Default Device Default - Light The premium version lets you make your own themes This will only work on apps that already use a Holo theme of some kind (which is most apps, and practically no games) Even then, some apps will mess up a bit The new Add-on store lets you download additional xposed mods which work with this one EG: the Settings_light addon makes the icons down the left of the settings app black, to use with Holo Light Visit XDA thread for more details Credits to @NeverUseful for the icon! Storage permissions are for backups Internet permissions are for ads and addons (no ads in premium)

건강노트 (Health note) app 은 개인의 건강관리를 위해 임상의사가 만든 노트형식의 어플리케이션입니다. 혈압관리, 혈당관리, 고지혈관리, 체중관리, 예약관리, 기타검사관리, 처방전저장, 숙녀노트, 동맥경화위험도, 비만도, 대사증후군 등 다양한 메뉴가 포함되어있습니다. 또한, 병원에서 수액치료를 받을 때 치료잔여 시간을 본인이 직접 계산 할 수 있는 수액치료시간예측의 기능도 있습니다. 다수의 사용자 등록이 가능하며 우측 상단 사용자 이름을 길게 눌러 사용자 전환을 할 수 있습니다. -혈압, 혈당, 체중의 입력 관리와 이전의 기록과 비교하여 알아보기 쉬운 그래프로 결과를 확인할 수 있습니다. -고지혈 관리 지침에 따라 실시간 입력한 혈압, 혈당, 혈액검사와 병력정보를 기반으로 동맥경화위험도계산 및 콜레스테롤치료 목표치, 비만도, 대사증후군의 정도를 제공합니다. -처방전을 사진 찍어 저장하고 예약 및 검사결과를 기록관리 할 수 있습니다. -숙녀노트는 여성의 생리주기에 따른 계획 및 기록을 관리할 수 있습니다. -환자의 수액치료(영양주사제) 시 수액 치료시간을 정확히 알려주는 기능이 있습니다. 1. 사용자 등록 - 사용자를 등록하고 병력입력 및 기타 특이사항을 입력합니다. 2. 혈압 - 혈압을 기록관리하고 누적된 혈압결과를 그래프로 보여주어 혈압변화를 평가하는 메뉴입니다. 3. 혈당 - 식전(공복시)혈당, 식후혈당, 취침전 혈당을 기록관리하고 누적된 혈당결과를 그래프로 보여주어 혈당변화를 평가하는 메뉴입니다. 4. 고지혈 - 혈액검사(콜레스테롤 등) 정보를 입력하는 메뉴입니다. 혈액검사입력란에 Total 콜레스테롤, HDL콜레스테롤, TG (중성지방)을 입력하면 LDL콜레스테롤이 자동 계산됩니다. 5. 비만도 - 키, 몸무게를 기록하여 비만도, 체질량지수(BMI)를 산출하고 체중변화를 그래프로 보는 메뉴입니다. 6. 기타검사 - 기타 검사결과를 입력 하는 메뉴입니다. 7. 예약기록 - 진료 및 검사예약 특이사항(약물 부작용)을 기록하고 관리하는 메뉴입니다. 8. 처방 기록 - 처방전을 관리하는 메뉴입니다. (처방전 사진 찍기, 처방전 직접 입력) 9. 예방접종 - 성인 및 소아의 예방접종 스케줄을 관리 10. 숙녀노트 - 생리일 및 배란예정일을 예측하고 기록 관리하는 메뉴입니다. 11. 종합결과. - 사용자가 입력한 정보 (성별, 나이, 혈압, 혈당, 체중, 키, 개인병력, 가족력, 혈액검사 – Total, HDL 콜레스테롤, 중성지방TG수치)를 update하여 동맥경화위험도, 비만도, 대사증후군의 결과를 보여주는 메뉴입니다. 12. 수액치료시간예측도우미(IVIC) - 수액량을 입력하고 점적통에 수액 방울이 떨어질 때를 맞추어 화면을 5회 이상 연속으로 터치하면 현재수액속도가 측정되어 치료잔여시간을 알려줍니다. - 본 애플리케이션의 종합 결과는 콜레스테롤 교육 프로그램과 치료지침에 근거하였으며 정확한 평가보다는 참고자료로 사용하십시오. -수액 치료시간 예측도우미 사용 시 1 mL의 방울 수를 나타내는 수액세트의 점적계수(drop factor)는 병원에서 주로 사용하는 1mL=20방울을 기본 값으로 설정하였습니다. 사용시 간호사에게 확인 바랍니다. www.hanvitmd.com ivic@hanvitmd.com ---- 개발자 연락처 : 대전광역시 서구 둔산동 1457 둔산현대아이텔 1026호 TEL. 042.488.2200 | FAX. 042.487.3321  Health Notes (Health note) app for the health care of the individual clinician notes created with the application form. That give us strength. :) *** Introducing CarStory - managing your car expenses, one tap at a time. *** Key Features - Very easy and user-friendly interface. - Add multiple vehicles and view their fuel economy. - View expenses in a graph or list for the month/year. - Time and mileage based service reminders. (Engine Oil, etc) - Support fuel economy calculation methods (Empty To Empty, Full To Full, L/100km) - Export and import excel(xls) files. (Export to Email Support) - Multiple units support. (mile, km, gallon, liter, custom currency) - Automatic data backups. (Data is always backed up in SD card. e.g. Autosave.xls) Bugs? Issues? Feature requests? Please write me an email Email : help@hasapp.com YOUR CAR EXPENSES, ALL IN ONE PLACE. Cars can be expensive, and keeping track of every bill, every fill-up and every service can be time consuming. With CarStory, you can say goodbye to invoices and say hello to an easier way to keep track of your automotive-related expenses. STAY ONE STEP AHEAD WITH CarStory. CarStory is a new tool developed to help you stay on top of your expenses wherever you go. You can add your latest fill up within seconds and view how much you are spending on your car each month. KEEP TRACK OF CAR WASHES, PARKING FEES AND MUCH MORE. CarStory lets you note any expense and then view statistical data about how much you have spent each month or each year. Add multiple vehicles and view fuel economy for each car - helping you to save money and time. YOUR CAR’S COMPANION. CarStory is your car’s companion, know exactly how much your car is costing you and track the expenses in an easy-to-understand graph. See what’s burning a hole in your pocket and view your car’s fuel economy with ease. IMPORT AND EXPORT OF EXCEL FILES. You can export your records as a XLS file for later viewing, furthermore, you can import XLS files to load previous data. CarStory autosaves your expenses so you will never lose an important record ever again.

description: Transit Tracker - UTA allows riders to take advantage of the Utah Transit Authority's vehicle monitoring and stop finding services. Transit Tracker - UTA also includes the ability to download route schedules. Transit Tracker - UTA allows you to define alerts for UTA routes and stops; get a notification when a vehicle on a specific route is approaching or arriving at a particular stop. Please send me an email if you find a problem or if you have any comments or suggestions. TRACKING UTA's buses and trains report their locations every 15 seconds (Flex routes are not included). TRAX and FrontRunner route numbers: Blue line - 701 Red line - 703 Green line - 704 FrontRunner - 750 - Put in a route number and see all vehicles on that route, put in a stop number to see all buses serving that stop, or put in an individual vehicle number (printed inside and on the back of UTA buses). ROUTE SCHEDULES - You can request a route schedule for any UTA route by entering its number. Schedules can be viewed as origin/destination tables or on a map. On the map, see when the next bus/train is scheduled to arrive by tapping on a stop. See all times for that stop by tapping on the info window that appears. CLOSE STOPS - Select your current location or an address you enter or select on a map as a search location for UTA stops that are nearby. You can specify a maximum number of stops to return as well as an optional route filter. ALERTS - You can define alerts for when a UTA vehicle is approaching or arriving at a particular stop. These alerts are based on distance from the stop, using the shape of the route defined by UTA. - Because these alerts depend on the vehicle following the shape defineUd by UTA, if the vehicle is on detour, or if the vehicle isn't following the defined route for some other reason, your alert may not trigger as expected. DIRECTIONS - Choose an origin, a destination, and the time you would like to either depart or arrive, and the Google Maps app will display the different options available using UTA's buses and trains. TWITTER - Transit Tracker - UTA displays the latest updates from @RideUta. Other features: - Choose a light or dark theme. - Show satellite imagery and/or color-coded traffic data on the map. - Optionally keep the map screen from dimming and shutting off. - Adjust the update interval of UTA vehicle locations. - Choose a custom ringtone for UTA alerts.

Let us bring what you need to you at a time that suits you, even if you need it the same day! - Fast-Track Collection: Get in. Get your stuff. Get going! Couldn't be simpler! - 1 Click Reservation: Need it? Want it? Can't live a second longer without it?? Tap 1 Click and it'll be there waiting for you. - Wishlist: Filling a new home? Waiting for pay day? Building a birthday or Christmas list? Tap the heart symbol and save all your favourite items in one place. What more could you wish for? - Check Stock: We love seeing our customers but we don't want you to waste a journey so you can quickly and easily check stock at your nearest and favourite stores with a simple tap. We want to make the best apps in the world...ever. Maybe a bit ambitious but we want the Argos app to be one of your 'must haves' and that means we need your help and ideas. We love fanciful ideas, nothing is too big or too small so please feel free to go nuts! We do love a challenge and our developers are workaholic demons (a couple might actually be demons) so get in touch via appdev@homeretailgroup.com to keep them busy...society simply isn't ready to meet them yet. Permissions required for this app: • Identity: This is so we can remember your key details for you, such as your preferred delivery address and contact details. • Location: So we can show you the stores and stock that is closest to where you are • Microphone: Use your voice to search for products like never before • Wi-Fi connection information: This means we can find you with better accuracy to show you where your nearest Argos store is.
release_text: Version 3.1.0: Search Suggestion - simply start typing and we will suggest our most popular categories for you. Improved Store Locator - bigger maps, better information and improved favourite store options. Fast Track - buy with the app for our fastest ways to shop - same day home delivery on over 20,000 products - collect in-store in as little as 60 seconds

description: The year is 2084 and the galaxy is in chaos. Humanity has discovered alien technology allowing space travel between the planets, opening up the universe for exploration and conquest. Forces around the solar system battle for supremacy, but one leader must rise up to unite the galaxy against all intergalactic invaders. Welcome to the ultimate sci-fi adventure, Rivals at War: 2084. TRAIN an elite team of space marines. EQUIP these soldiers with weapons, helmets and armor for epic battles. ATTACK rival teams from around the solar system. CONQUER the galaxy, one planet at a time. FIGHT for victory and rule the universe! * Star Map Story Mode - plot your conquest of the galaxy across 75 different planets. * Rivals Mode - challenge your Facebook friends and go to war in head-to-head combat * Daily Campaigns – crush the competition across three different skill levels to win rewards and prizes * Strategy and tactics - select powerful tactic cards to influence each battle and overcome your opponents * Player Achievements – progress through the game by completing over 45 special achievements RAW: 2084 has full resolution support for tablets and large screen phones!
release_text: Cpl Hicks here! Welcome to the unit. We are deploying across the galaxy. Here is the latest sitrep: * Support for Google+ Sign-in. * Now with Google Play Leaderboards! * Now with Google Play Achievements! RAW: 2084 has full support for tablets!

description: RECRUIT an elite team of combat soldiers and shooters who are ready for duty anytime and anywhere. TRAIN your soldiers and upgrade your weapons for each mission. ATTACK the enemy and watch epic head-to-head battles unfold. CONQUER rival teams from around the world. Fight for VICTORY and become the elite of the elite! * Battle across four different combat scenarios, each with its own 3D battlefield and military mission. * Assemble your troop, choosing from 6 unique soldier types - Commander, Sniper, Saw Gunner, Breacher, Radioman and Medic. * Power-up skill perks to enhance the Accuracy, Speed, Damage, Defense and Health abilities of your soldiers. * Unlock new soldiers with better weapons, guns and skills to improve your team's combat assault rating. * Customize your team with different camouflage uniforms, headgear, and team badges. * Select powerful tactics cards to tip each battle in your favor. * 45 achievements to complete that unlock more special rewards. * Command your elite team to global domination. It is your duty to protect the world from the threats of terrorism and chaos. Aim for glory and honor and prepare to become Rivals at War! RAW has full resolution support for tablets and large screen phones!

description: TAKE CONTROL of an elite team of combat soldiers. UPGRADE your weapons for each mission. FIGHT alongside your team in head-to-head battles. CONQUER rival teams from around the world. Fight for VICTORY and become the best team! * Lead your Commander soldier into the firefight, taking part in the battles with full targeting and shooting control * Battle across 7 different combat scenarios, each with its own 3D map and day and night missions * Assemble your team, choosing from 6 unique soldier types - Commander, Medic, Radioman, Breacher, SAW Gunner, and Sniper * Upgrade your soldiers' skills: Speed, Accuracy, Damage, Health, and Defence * Customize your team with different uniforms and headgear * Use powerful tactic cards to shift each battle in your favour * Over 40 achievements to complete and unlock special rewards * Compete against other players' teams to dominate the leaderboards It is your duty to protect the world from the threats of terrorism and chaos. Go wild! * We've adjusted how long it takes to control the zone to give you a fighting chance. * Squashed some annoying bugs! * Completed a couple housekeeping tasks to help us make the best game for you. We hope you enjoy the game.

description: The Full Moon Free application shows the appearance and events for both sun and moon from your Phone's current location, and you can quickly check any location in the world using the map view. Perfect for photosessions or other activities where you need this information. The calculations for events are accurate to a few minutes of the US Naval Observatory sun and moon calendars, and it doesn't rely on large astronomical data updates, nor on-line sites. AVIA Full Moon is an application that presents an accurate moon phase and the official sunrise, sunset, moonrise, and moonset times for any place on Earth and for any date between Jan 1,1900 and Dec 31, 2099. The application instantly shows the appearance and events for your iPhone's current location, and you can quickly check any location in the world using the map view. Perfect for fishing or hunting trips, or astronomers and astrologers. The calculations for events are accurate to a few minutes of the US Naval Observatory sun and moon calendars, and it doesn't rely on large astronomical data updates, nor on-line sites. In fact, it never accesses the Internet! This avoids any roaming charges from your operator. If you use the map function, you naturally need to have internet access. Special Features: - informative, at-a-glance views with crisp graphics - reports if the Sun or the Moon never sets or rises at a location on a certain day - accounts for Daylight Saving Time for use in any country and any date - map view supports planning trips ahead to "on-the-hour" timezones sharing the phone location's Daylight Saving Time - all algorithms have been updated to include the latest modifications, and verified against the US Naval Observatory and major astronomy sites. The App includes phases, lunar, eclipses,orbit, calendar,Utica, almanac, equinox, half, set, rise, sunrise, sunset, moonset, moonrise and more. AVIA Full Moon is quick, easy to use, and universal!

HTC Fetch is a "find me" tag with a sleek, compact key fob design that can be attached to any object within proximity of your Bluetooth Smart Ready phone. Use HTC Fetch to find your phone or other misplaced belongings and valuables like your keys or wallet. Provides an "electronic leash" and notifies you when the object is out of range or when returning to range. Saves the last known location when connected and displays the location on a map. This app is primarily intended to support devices that do not have the native support for HTC Fetch included in HTC Sense. Users with supported HTC devices can already connect to Fetch using the built-in pairing support in Settings > Bluetooth and do not require this app. HTC users should not attempt to connect to the Fetch tag using this app AND the built-in Bluetooth pairing setting at the same time, as it may result in connection issues. Version 1.1 of this app now supports the remote camera shutter feature on HTC devices. Easy to set up. Easier to use. Pro Tip: Remember to long press the action button for 10 seconds on the HTC Fetch tag to reset it before connecting it with a new phone using the HTC Fetch app. HTC, the HTC logo and other HTC product and service names referenced in the Application are the trademarks or registered trademarks of HTC Corporation in the United States and other countries. Any other company names, product names, service names and logos referenced in connection with the Application may be the trademarks of their respective owners.
release_text: Bluetooth pairing is no longer required.

HTC Sense Home combines the power of BlinkFeed, Themes, and the Sense Home widget to create a customizable and deeply personal experience. BlinkFeed BlinkFeed makes it easy to get all the media that matters to you in one elegantly arranged, constantly updated place on your Home screen. To see your friends' latest updates, just add your social media accounts like Facebook, Instagram and Tumblr. To get articles on almost any topic, add topics using partner apps or search for favorite RSS feeds. You can manage the topics you subscribe to in partner apps. Around mealtime, you'll even get recommendations for nearby restaurants, cafes and bars to try in BlinkFeed or on your lock screen. When you're nearby an interesting event, you'll get a suggestion to stop by. HTC Themes Feeling imaginative? Reinvent your phone by creating a theme from scratch in just two steps! Start by selecting a favorite photo for the Home screen wallpaper, then choose a style that changes your phone's icons, colors, sounds and fonts all at once. Want even quicker customization? Download one of the stunning designs featured in the store! Follow your favorite theme designers to get updates when they publish new content. While you browse, be sure to bookmark, comment on and rate themes you really love. Sense Home Widget Beauty isn't much without brains. Thankfully, HTC's intelligent Sense Home widget makes it effortless to access the apps you use most frequently. Whether you're at home, work or out-and-about, the widget auto populates a set of frequently-used apps based on your location and offers app suggestions based on your location. Some features of HTC Sense Home require Sense 7. By downloading this application you acknowledge and agree that you have read agree to the end user license agreement located at [ http://www.htc.com/www/terms/terms-of-use/ ]. HTC Corporation's Privacy Policy describing HTC Corporation's collection, use and disclosure of information is located at [ http://www.htc.com/www/terms/privacy/ ].

Have your HTC Phone Directory at your fingertips anytime, anywhere! You can find any local business or residential listing by toggling between a standard list-view and map-view, get directions, click-to-call a business, browse business' websites, and find enhanced information on business profile pages. In addition, GPS guided map navigation allows users to navigate listings by simply manipulating the map. Listing results are automatically updated as you scroll or change the zoom level on the map without requiring you to resubmit a search. The HTC application for iPhone®, iPod® Touch, iPad® and Android™ devices helps you find businesses and people quickly and easily. • One integrated application that allows you to search for any business or person. • Uses GPS (where available) to find listings close to you, and view them on the map. • Instant directions and Turn-by-Turn Navigation now available for users with GPS enabled devices and Apple Maps (iOS6) or Google Maps. • Quick Find Shortcut Screen to search most popular categories! • You can view detailed information on a business; this may include: addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, website URL’s, hours of operation, services, products, specialties, videos, photo montages and display ads (where available). • Once you've chosen the listing, you can instantly save it to your contacts or share the information by Facebook, Twitter, email or SMS. • Built in QR Code Reader with flashlight! Scan any QR or barcode code, day or night! Dynamic Content HTC allows you real-time access to listings, ads and categories within any of our directories. Information is updated daily, so you know the listings supplied to your mobile device are always up to date! This app contains all the listing information from both the Business Directory and Residential Directory sections of our printed phone directories across all of the regions we cover. All mobile content is driven from the same data that's published in our online business and residential directories on our website. It truly is your best local search! Click-To-Call Within the HTC App, all our directories are presented in a list-view format. This provides a simple text-based interface and “Click-to-Call” functionality that allows mobile phone users an easy way to place calls directly from advertisers’ listings. Mobile broadband customers using Internet web browsers will enjoy the added benefits of an improved graphical interface along with easily accessible ads, coupons, maps and driving directions. Speech Recognition HTC offers speech recognition to make finding a listing fast and easy. Entering a simple search term like “Plumbing Contractors” using the standard iPhone® touch interface can take well over 15 keystrokes. With speech recognition, you can simply push a button and speak your search query – thus greatly reducing the number of steps required to find a local business. QR Code Reader/Scanner Local Search now scans both QR codes and barcodes! With a single click using your smartphone or tablet camera you will be redirected to profile pages, webpage links, books review, multimedia and calendar online information. QR Codes generated by HTC will load automatically within the app, optimizing your results!

Have you ever taken a risk to see your dashboard while driving? If you take your eyes off from the road for 1-2 seconds to see the speedometer when you're running at 100km/h (62mph), it is same as you're driving 30-50 meters with your eyes closed. Now, try "Simple HUD" for your safety! "Simple HUD" gives you: - Your current speed via GPS. - Speed display unit in km/h, mph or knot. - Various color themes and easily changed by scrolling left to right. - Easy and straightforward - just run this app and put it on to your dashboard on night. - Simple design which does not distract your driving. LIMITATIONS: - "Simple HUD" uses GPS signal to measure your speed. This may show inaccurate speed due to the satellite signal strength, device's status, or other unforeseen matters. - HUD is for dark situations only. During the daylight, use a stand for viewing. WARNING: - Manipulation of the program while driving is dangerous. CUSTOMER SUPPORT: - We'd love to hear from you! - Please send any comments, suggestions or bugs directly to support@hubinsoft.com - This is working video. http://youtu.be/39KQA9rq378

** New lower price, now $.99! - Limited Time Fall Hunting Sale ** FFL Finder is an indispensable app that helps hunters and shooters locate Federal Firearms License holders - our source of not only firearms purchases, but parts, repairs, ammunition, hunting and shooting gear and related accessories. Imagine you are traveling and your firearm is lost, optics damaged, need ammunition, need repairs - and you need them NOW! With FFL Finder, you simply open the app and instantly get mapped results of FFL holders near your location (via GPS) or by selecting an area on a map. FFL Finder Features: • Filter searches by up to 9 different FFL types • Search listings using partial names (like those containing certain phrases) • 2 ways to search: By your current location, or by centering the FFL Finder map on any location in the US. • Adjustable radius of distance for results • Dial phone of target listing from within FFL Finder app NOTE: This app requires an internet or Wi-Fi enabled connection in order to retrieve current data for display/mapping. -- Quick Start Instructions: Open the app on your device. The main screen appears with a "world view map". At bottom right, click "My Location". The map should center on your current location, and provide a blue "beacon" for where you are, currently. Next, click "Search" at bottom right. You can search using a name, if you would like. Or, leave blank and adjust your search radius. 20 miles is default. Click "Show Results" and red pins will drop showing you the locations of FFL Holders within your search radius. Click a pin on the map for a quick view of their name and phone number. Click the blue arrow at the right of the info box to view full name, address, and location information. You can also adjust your "Settings" on the bottom left of the screen, in the Hunt Geek menu bar. This allows for searching/filtering of the different FFL Types. You can also search for FFL holders by "map center". Why and how, you might ask? For instance, you might need equipment for a trip that is near SLC, Utah. To locate FFL holders in Salt Lake City, Utah, you'd simply pinch and zoom the map to that city. Then, click "search" and then "Show results". The results will be centered around what you see on the map. This enables you to search for FFL holders in areas where you might not know the zip code, but you do know the location or general area. Disclaimer: Although information is believed to be accurate, and updated frequently, please double-check information before traveling. Map points are approximations and actual addresses should be referred to for best accuracy. Hunt Geek, Inc. assumes no responsibility for misuse of this app or the information contained within.

** New lower price, now $.99! - Limited Time Fall Hunting Sale ** Shooting Hours was developed by hunters, for hunters. Accurately calculate Sunrise and Sunset (and Shooting Hours) for turkey, deer, duck, or goose hunting or any activity where sunrise and sunset times are important. Use your mobile device to notify you of the opening of shooting hours and again when the day's hunt comes to a close. Shooting Hours was born from days spent in the field checking watches, looking for sunrise and sunset tables and constantly wondering if the information we remembered was accurate. Never again! Simply download Shooting Hours to your device, adjust your settings to match your "Shooting Hours" and wait for Shooting Hours to vibrate your device (where available) to let you know when shooting hours have opened and closed. The application also includes visual Shooting Hours "Open" and "Closed" signs boldly displayed on the main screen. Shooting Hours Features: • The ability to calculate accurate sunrise and sunset times based on your location using the GPS in your enabled device. • Manual location mode to enter your own latitude and longitude for devices that do not offer GPS functionality, of for calculating sunrise and sunset times for locations where GPS reception may not be available. • Customized "Shooting Hours" settings so that you can set when your shooting hours open and close to adjust for legal hunting hours for a specific species or state/location. Choose from various presets or use your own specific times. • Vibration notification at the opening and closing of shooting hours, along with visual cue on-screen while the app is running. • 30-day outlook showing sunrise, sunset and moon phases tables for your current location. Look for more Hunting and Outdoor-related apps from Hunt Geek! We value your feedback and feature requests. Please send your comments and suggestions to questions@huntgeek.com . Visit Hunt Geek online at http://www.HuntGeek.com Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Hunt-Geek/304026146353 Disclaimer: Check local, state and federal hunting regulations for complete details on hunting seasons, legal shooting hours and guidelines. Hunt Geek assumes no legal responsibility for misuse of this app or complications arising from its use for a specific purpose.
release_text: • NEW! Moon phase data added to the 30-day Outlook section next to sunrise/sunset information. • GPS tweaks, the GPS should now be faster and more accurate.

description: § Daily Water? It is the application that will help on the basis of the body of the user information , to be able to ingest the recommended intake of water a day . § description by Menu - Widget * Widget 2x2 size is provided, you can see the sunflower of the current state was put to pollen . * After a user has drank the water , it becomes less and less , over time to fill up water to the pot When you record . * It helps to be able to drink the water users to remember through the alarm water is all gone to pot . ( However , if an alarm is set ) - Today * It is a menu that allows you to record the amount of water I drank today . * If you touch the water cup icon on the screen , it is possible to make a record . * If you touch the icon that the curved arrow to the left , it is possible to remove up-to-date records of the .   * Bar on the left are those of the recommended intake , expressed as a percentage the amount you drink today . * It is possible to grow a sunflower in that the user leaves the record with a cup of water . Sunflower , growing little by little time after the recording has elapsed . * Sunflower , can be confirmed through the widget . * At the top , today , I will show in ml / cup unit the recommended dose of the amount of water he drank . - Graph * By using a bar graph water intake was recorded using a Daily Water, it indicates the month . * You can press the button at the top , to check the statistics of the last month . - History * You can view a history of user drank water . * Cup that has been selected , when you drank the water , you can see the time difference between the amount you drink , and the previous record . - Tip * I collected a common sense health and variety of information related to water . - Setting * You can make settings and notification of the user's weight . * By using the input information , calculates the intake recommended water day at the top , and are shown in units of ml . * Asked to enter the time you go to bed and time to get up , set the alarm to prevent the alarm sounds during sleep . Language Support : English , Japanese , Korean Keywords : water , health , during , skin , anti-aging , management , body check

description: Skate X 3D is a fun a skate boarding endless run sports game, where you, the skater, must jump, duck, and skate around to avoid being hit by the objects and oncoming cars. Perform tricks and pull off stunts to perform an endless run and a high score to boast about. Skate X 3D offers endless fun with the endless game-play that will have you jumping over barriers and under traffic signs, collecting coins to increase your high score. Watch out for oncoming traffic that will stop you from getting the endless run and the chance to get the highest score possible that you can achieve. If you like endless games or running games, you will love this game. Not only do you get to earn money, you also get to spend it on more levels and more skaters. Everything in the game can be bought buy money you earn.

Bayan ul Quran Video lectures by Dr. Israr Ahmed Watch Bayan ul Quran Video lectures by Dr. Israr Ahmed. This app is also compatible with Android TV. Israr Ahmed (Urdu: ڈاکٹر اسرار احمد‎; April 26, 1932 – April 14, 2010; Msc, MD) was a prominent Pakistani Islamic theologian, philosopher,[2] and one of the noted Islamic scholar followed particularly in South Asia as well as by the South Asian diaspora in the Middle East, Western Europe, and North America. Dr. Israr Ahmed wrote and published 60 books on the different aspects of Islam and religion, nine of which were translated into English. His shows were usually shown on Peace TV, ARY, GEO TV other TV Channels of Pakistan Please provide your reviews.

description: Get the Best Cardio Tracking App for Free: • Free Tracking of Runs, Bike Rides & More • GPS Maps & Records Time in Workout, Distance, Speed, Splits, Laps and more • Voice Feedback – Customize when and what feedback you want • Share Results with Facebook, Twitter or via Email • See Workouts Online at My.Digifit.com Now integrates with: • Fitbit • MyFitnessPal • Withings Add a Heart Rate Monitor For*: • Real-time Heart Rate, Charts and Training Feedback • More Accurate Caloric Burn! • Fitness Assessments – Measure Your VO2 Max & Overall Fitness Levels, Create Custom Heart Rate Training Zones • Custom Heart Rate Zones – Create Your Own or Let the New Fitness Assessments Create Them for You • Track Indoor Cardio like Rowing & Elliptical Supported Heart Rate Monitors: • Polar Wearlink+ Bluetooth Classic Heart Rate Monitor • Zephyr HxM Bluetooth Classic Heart Rate Monitors • Scosche Rhythm and MyTREK Heart Rate Monitors (Pulse) **Support no longer available for Android 5.0 * Heart Rate Monitor support and Fitness Assessments require in-app upgrades. iCardio Free Version (See Below for Full Heart Rate Monitor Supported Features) Track your workouts indoors & out – runs, rides, Spin® and other exercises like rowing and elliptical*. Map your outdoor runs and rides, record your time, distance, speed and more, then share your results. Swipe through to see maps, charts, and other stats in real-time or in results. • Track Distance, Time, Pace/Speed and Splits See your progress real-time with easy-to-read metric screens. Swipe through to see maps, charts, and other stats. • Complete Route Mapping See your routes and progress real-time with an overlay of key metrics. View all your past routes in results. Zoom in and out for more details. • Listen to Voice Feedback as you Workout Hear pace / speed, distance and elapsed time when you reach selected distance or time milestones (ex. every mile or every 5 minutes). • See Your Results and Charts for All Workouts View overall stats (pace/speed, distance, time duration and more) as well as pace charts, route maps, and split breakouts. • Share Results, Charts and Maps E-mail your workout results or post them to Facebook or Twitter. Export to .CSV, .GPX, or .TCX files and analyze your data in depth. • Sync Data to the Web and View Online Never lose your data with automatic cloud back up. Syncs all devices so you have all your data on your iPhones, iPods and iPads, and a bigger view of you online. Add Heart Rate Monitor Support and Fitness Assessments In-App Upgrades Add a Polar Wearlink+ Bluetooth Classic heart rate monitor, Scosche Rhythm or Zephyr HxM for real-time heart rate and training feedback. Enjoy great cardio workouts and track your health effortlessly with iCardio. Also now in beta - Bluetooth Low Energy support for the HTC One and Samsung Galaxy S4, as well as for DROID RAZR (Polar H7 and H6 BLE HRM only for RAZR). • Track Heart Rate with Real-Time Charting Cardio is what we live for! Get the most out of your iCardio experience by monitoring your heart rate zones (aerobic, anaerobic, etc.) using the real-time chart, in depth analysis and more. Great customizable voice feedback based on zones and transition too. • Calories Based on Your Heart Rate Intensity Our calorie algorithms are driven by heart rate and factor in your height, weight, age, gender and fitness level – the only way to get accurate Calorie burn numbers. • Custom Heart Rate Zones Manually adding custom zone ranges by workout type, or create your custom zones using our Fitness Assessments. • Fitness Assessments Ever wonder how fit you are, or if training is paying off? Now you can know with a heart rate monitor and our Fitness Assessments upgrade. Create custom heart rate training zones; estimate your VO2 Max and Fitness Rank (from 1 to 100, age adjusted), and more. Watch your fitness level increase with good training. How cool is that? See more at www.digifit.com/android

description: Professional atmospheric pressure measurement tool for devices which have pressure sensor. Plus altimeter tool. - Shows two graph at separate window: by hours and by days - Shows current atmosphere pressure - Setting of all colors and transparency. - Set corrections value, sensor query times, wide of ranges, normal pressure, and many other settings - Shows atmospheric pressure in mmHg, mBar, lbHg, hPa and PSI - Widget 1*1, 2*2, 2*1, 3*1 - Collect and shows statistic on widget - Altimeter, set base altitude and height and measure height Optimization for android 4.0 (ICS). To use Altimeter - First click on indicator - ON, next OFF the altimeter mode. Long tap on indicator - set the base value of pressure and altitude. To set base value go to Settings -> Common settings. You cat measure up to 10000m (teoretically I can't test it) - I use correct formula. Attention! Works only in pda with pressure sensor: Samsung Galaxy Note, Samsung Galaxy S3 (SGS3) , Galaxy Nexus, Motorola Xoom, Xiaomi Phone 2 and Sony Ericsson Active. Languages: English, Russian, Deutsch, France, Polski. If you want this program on your native language, and ready to translate some strings - please write me on ivolk@yandex.ru . description: Italian Soccer is the app already downloaded by more than 3 million soccer fans in Italy to follow all the Italian football and the best of the European leagues: - Italian leagues: Serie A, Serie B, Lega Pro, Serie D, Campionato Primavera - Cups: Champions League, Europa League, Coppa Italia, Supercoppa Italiana ed Europea, Coppa Italia Lega Pro - European leagues: Premier League, Bundesliga, Ligue1, La Liga, Eredivisie, Primeira Liga - National team: Europei, Mondiali, Confederations Cup, Under 21 FOOTBALL ON TV Don't miss a single match broadcasted on TV: bring with you the complete schedule of all matches on terrestrial and sat channels, together with the weekly listing of sport programs. ODDS Comparing odds of the main bookmakers has never been easier: quickly check the open odds and who's offering the best odds among the available bookmakers, including Eurobet, Sisal, SNAI, TotoSì, Intralot, Lottomatica and others. FOLLOW THE CHAMPIONS ON TWITTER Italian Soccer brings to you tweets, photos and videos posted by teams and players, so you'll always be updated on news and gossip straight from your favorite football champions. HISTORY Who conquered the Champions League trophy on 2010? Who won the derby the last year? Thanks to the complete archive, you'll have the answers to these an many other questions: football has no more secrets. FAVORITE TEAM All the info you'll ever need about your favorite team always with you: the complete match schedule, players' detail, team awards and latest transfers. This app helps you to train the slow thinking part of your brain. This system is responsible for all tasks that require your full attention, like doing math, solving a complicated puzzle or learning a lot of content in your class. Nobel laureate Daniel Kahneman outlined two distinct systems in his book "Thinking Fast and Slow", called fast and slow thinking (system 1 and 2). He invented a very simple method to specifically train this slow thinking part of your brain. You simply take four numbers at random and add 1 to each number in a steady rhythm. This requires your full concentration and will help you gain focus for other mental tasks. In its simplest form it's called add-1. This app is a great tool to prepare yourself for challenging mental tasks, such as learning for a difficult exam, preparing a talk or giving a presentation. It helps to bolster your arithmetic skills, sharpen your focus and train your ability to focus on a single task. With the new version you can now also compete against other players from around the world, by comparing your score every day with other players.

3D Jesus Fish Live Wallpaper (also known as Christian Live Wallpaper). A beautiful golden representation of the symbol of modern Christianity rotates between "Jesus" and and "ΙΧΘΥΣ (Ichthys)" as it sparkles on your screen! Celebrate your faith in God and Jesus with this beautiful Jesus Live Wallpaper. Please email me if you have any questions, suggestions, or issues. Ichthys (also Ichthus or Ikhthus /ˈɪkθəs/[1]), from the Koine Greek word for fish: ἰχθύς, (capitalized ΙΧΘΥΣ or ΙΧΘΥϹ) is a symbol consisting of two intersecting arcs, the ends of the right side extending beyond the meeting point so as to resemble the profile of a fish, used by early Christians as a secret Christian symbo and now known colloquially as the "sign of the fish" or the "Jesus fish." Symbolic Meaning of the "Jesus Fish"- ΙΧΘΥΣ (Ichthys) is an acronym for "Ίησοῦς Χριστός, Θεοῦ Υἱός, Σωτήρ", (Iēsous Christos, Theou Yios, Sōtēr), which translates into English as "Jesus Christ, God's Son, Savior". Historians say the 20th-century use of the ichthys motif is an adaptation based on an Early Christian symbol which included a small cross for the eye or the Greek letters "ΙΧΘΥΣ". The "Jesus Fish" was rebirthed in the early 70s to become an icon of modern Christianity recognized around the world. It was caused through a chain of circumstances. First the Vietnam War caused distrust and peaceful rebellion within the younger generations of Americans and Australians. In 1973 they brought the symbol and message to the Aquarius Rock Festival in Nimbin Australia. From there it became a household symbol around the world. Today, it can be seen as a decal or emblem on the rear of automobiles or as pendants or necklaces as a sign that the owner is a Christian. It is incorporated into business logos or in business advertisements and listings in telephone books. It is also seen on clothing. Versions of this include an Ichthys with "Jesus" or "ΙΧΘΥΣ" in the center, or simply the Ichthys outline by itself. People might also search for this under God, Easter, Crucifixion, Jesus Christ Live Wallpaper, Jesus Live Wallpaper, Jesus Fish Live Wallpaper or Bible live wallpaper. This is built in celebration of peace and love around the globe.

The ORIGINAL CopyCat. Over one million downloads! CopyCat is a simple and addictive memory game. Watch the lights and try to repeat the sequence. The sequence will get longer and faster with each round. But be careful, one wrong tap and... bzzz! game over. Features: * Timeout (race the clock) * 4 start-up speeds * 4 button theme styles * 2 tone styles * Local & global leaderboards * Full HD graphics * Works great on tablets too CopyCat features high quality graphics and sounds. Test your memory and boost your brain power with this great game similar to childhood favorite 'simon says'. Simply follow the leader! This great retro game can be enjoyed by all ages. How to Play: Copy Cat will make a random sequence, starting with only one. All you have to do is repeat the pattern, taking turns with the computer. But be careful, the pattern will get longer and faster with each round. Hit the wrong button and BZZZ! It's game over!

description: Configurable bucket list of things you want to do before you die ( Death todos ). Items are not shared and are private only to you. Comes pre-filled with list of things you can do. Features include: - Tablet support. - Quick navigation. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. Quickly creates your own personal list in matter of minutes. - Auto Sort either in ascending or descending order. - Rearrange items/categories/lists using drag/drop. - Indicates the total number of items and the number of items that need to be completed. - Color coded (green, yellow and red) for a visually appealing presentation - Export/Backup all lists to external storage and import them back when needed. - Edit your list on your computer and import it back. - Easily email with your friends / family using any sharing client you have on your device. - Send and share via Bluetooth to any bluetooth enabled device - Easily send to your printer (via email - Needs email to print support on your printer)

description: Are you searching for the perfect name for your future baby boy or baby girl? This Baby Name Generator contains thousands of cute baby names from all around the world! Browse rapidly through more than 25000 baby names of different origins. Get new ideas quickly, and find the perfect name for your cherished little baby! Follow us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/babynamesimple to get weekly TOP 10s of the most favorite names! ●● Features: ♥ 25000 baby names and meanings. ♥ 60+ different origins ♥ Beautiful modern and minimalist design ♥ Dark theme for night reading and other colorful themes for everyone, including color-blind users. ♥ Animations and transitions ♥ Tablet version! Beautiful custom design for 10 inch and 7 inch tablets, fine tuned for Samsung Galaxy Tab and Google Nexus. ♥ Love a name: Long press on a name to love it. Access a your favorite names by pressing the heart icon! ♥ Gender filter. Search only baby boy names or baby girl. ♥ Search for baby names with a specific meaning ♥ Search by starting letters (e.g: "an" will show names like "Anabel, Anakin...") ♥ Search by ending letters (e.g: "an" will show names like "Ronan, Johan...") ♥ Print custom baby clothing with the baby name you like! ●● Getting Started with the Baby Name Generator: - Open the app - Select the origin you want, or search through "All Origins" - Select the gender - Click "Go >" - Scroll through the baby names and meanings and click on the one you like to display it in full screen. - Go back by pressing the return button. ●● To print custom baby clothing: Click on the tee shirt icon in the name definition panel. ●● To change theme: Click on the baby name icon several times (Top left icon). With the great variety of color themes, people with Protanopia, Deuteranopia, Tritanopia or other forms of color blindness will definitely find a theme that is easy to read. ●● About ads: Baby Name - Simple!'s development is supported by advertising. The paid version doesn't have in-app advertising and also has a better design due to more screen space and some additional feature. ●● Permission explained: Modify content of USB storage: Baby Name - Simple! just needs to copy some temporary files to the internal storage for the application to work. Full network access: required for displaying advertising. You found a bug, or you would like to submit some cute baby names and meanings you found? Send me an email!

** WITHOUT ROOT ACCESS: VIEW OR BACKUP ** ** WITH ROOT ACCESS: SAVE CHANGES ** ** EMAIL ME FEEDBACK/QUESTIONS! ** This application makes modifying the build.prop file very simple and quick. Features: **Quickly backup and restore the build.prop file **Easily view and edit (root required) the current build.prop **View a few common build.prop tweaks **Easily share/export the build.prop Android uses the /system/build.prop file to store important device information. The type of information stored here ranges from how the device identifies itself with the Google Play Store to screen pixel density. Many tweaks are available by modify the system values stored in the build.prop in order to allow better or custom performance and layout. Please email me, tweet me or find me on IRC and provide feedback, suggestions and comments. I'm always interested in improving my applications! Thanks for your support!

description: Mezi hlavní funkce patří zobrazení aktuálních srážek nad ČR (tzv. radarových snímků). Poznáte tak, kde aktuálně prší nebo sněží. Aplikace je dobrým pomocníkem na vaše cesty a výlety. V dalších vrstvách můžete zobrazit teploty z meteostanic v ČR nebo zprávy o aktuálním počasí od uživatelů serveru www.In-Pocasi.cz. Aplikace umožňuje zasílat informace o počasí ve vaší lokalitě. Pokud se u vás vyskytuje například silná bouřka, stačí v aplikaci vytvořit hlášení o počasí, které si následně přečtou stovky lidí. Přidat můžete aktuální fotografii či popis počasí. Ostatní lidi tak varujete před nepříznivým počasím, které panuje ve vašem městě a pravděpodobně zasáhne i další. Srážky a jejich předpověď (radar) Aplikace na mapě zobrazí aktuální srážky nad Českem a Německem s přesností až 1 km. Nechybí ani předpověď jejich vývoje na následující hodinu. Přesně tak poznáte, kdy přeháňka dorazí přímo do vašeho města. Údaje z meteostanic Na mapě jsou dostupné údaje z více než 100 meteorologických stanic. Meteorologické stanice zaznamenávají teplotu, vítr, srážky ale i vlhkost nebo tlak vzduchu. Blesky V případě bouřek aplikace zobrazí i místa, kde uhodil blesk. Na základě radarového snímku potom poznáte, jak se bude bouřka nadále vyvíjet. Meteozprávy Aplikace zobrazuje informace o počasí přímo od uživatelů, kteří sledují počasí v daných místech. Přidávejte informace o počasí Aplikace umožňuje zasílat informace o počasí ve vaší lokalitě. Pokud se u vás vyskytuje například silná bouřka, stačí v aplikaci vytvořit hlášení o počasí, které si následně přečtou stovky lidí. Ostatní lidi tak varujete před nepříznivým počasím, které panuje ve vašem městě a pravděpodobně zasáhne i další. http://www.in-pocasi.cz/aplikace/meteomapy.php The main features include display of actual rainfall over the Czech Republic (ie. Radar images). You will know where actually raining or snowing. The application is a good helper for your trips and excursions. In other layers you can display the temperature of meteorological stations in the Czech Republic or message about the current weather from server users www.In-Pocasi.cz. This application allows you to send information about the weather in your location. If you are suffering from a bad thunderstorm example, just in the application to create a weather report, which then read by hundreds of people. Add your current photo or description of the weather. Other people and warns against inclement weather that prevails in your town, and is likely to reach even further. Precipitation and weather (radar) Applications on the map displays the current rainfall over the Czech Republic and Germany with an accuracy of 1 km. There is also a prediction of their development to the next hour. Exactly know when showers arrive directly to your city. Data from weather stations The map data are available from more than 100 weather stations. Meteorological stations record the temperature, wind, precipitation as well as humidity or air pressure. Flash In the case of storms and the application displays the place where lightning struck. Based on the radar picture then you will know how the storm will continue to evolve. Meteozprávy The application displays weather information directly from users who monitor the weather in these locations. Add weather information This application allows you to send information about the weather in your location. If you are suffering from a bad thunderstorm example, just in the application to create a weather report, which then read by hundreds of people. Other people and warns against inclement weather that prevails in your town, and is likely to reach even further.   http://www.in-pocasi.cz/aplikace/meteomapy.php

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/jokerfun.group This game is suitable for all kind of genres from kids, girls and boys of all ages.
