Flutter Catch, the hit iOS game comes to Android! The well-being of the butterflies is at stake! Use your quick reflexes to catch and protect them from danger. But watch out! The killer bees may get angry and come after you. Catch the queen ant and prepare to stomp out her cavalry for a satisfying bonus. Flutter Catch for Android provides additional features such as Google Play Game Services. Do you have the talent and patience to save the butterflies? Test your skills and see how you fair against other players. The future of the butterflies is in your hands!
release_text: - Fixed Google Play Game Services settings.

description: All of the most basic and oft used chemistry equations and constants to help you through your studies.
Tap to flap. Avoid obstacles as birdy flies to collect points.
Puzzle involving rotating tiles to match adjacent lines. Solve to extend the middle tile's greenness throughout the 5x5, 7x7, 9x9, or 11x11 grid.
All of the most used equations in physics to help you through your studies.

Timetable is a school, college or university timetabling application for your Android phone. If you have a recurring timetable you have to stick to, Timetable will help you keep track of it. Its simple, elegant interface will get you to the information you need, quickly and efficiently, with intuitive navigation and a familiar timetable structure. Setting up your timetable takes mere minutes, and it is intuitive and easy - just press + to get started! Timetable was built with the Android Design guidelines in mind, It's optimized for Holo and optimized for tablets. ★ Features ★ ✔ Free - No ads, ever ✔ Easy to use and intuitive interface ✔ Support for dual week timetables (Week A and Week B) ✔ Enter Room, Teacher, Subject, Star + End times and Period ID information ✔ Clean interface ensures the information is there when you need it ✔ Choose between light and dark themes, compact or more detailed timetable ✔ Highly optimized for both phone and tablet use ✔ 2 different widgets (4x1 and 4x2 - both re-sizable) Feedback and bug reports are always welcome!
release_text: v1.0.1 - Fixed a few navigation issues

description: Vid2Pho is a free App to extract photos from your favorite video. The most cool App that you MUST have in your Android device. You can explore the video frame-by-frame by simply moving the slider bar or swiping the photos and take snaps from it. Photos can be saved to your device and shared on your favorite social networks like facebook, twitter or you can also share it via Bluetooth or E-Mail etc. - Browse video gallery and pick your favorite video - Slide the bar or simply swipe it to see all the photos in your video one-by-one - Save the best snaps to your photo gallery (sdcard) - Share it on facebook, twitter etc. - Send it via Bluetooth, E-Mail etc. Feature for the upcoming version: - Auto mode to quickly extract all the photos automatically from your video Give your positive ratings and valuable feedback's, stay tuned for the upcoming versions. Like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/joodioapps
release_text: - Added support for both portrait and landscape mode viewings - New set of icons instead of old boring style ;) - Improved seekbar to capture photos better

description: As one of the coolest and most user-friendly apps currently available, MetroMaps application allows the user to access subway maps of cities and towns around the globe. This first-class application lets the user view maps for traveling plans, destinations, and locations of their choice. What is truly great about this application is that the user does not need Internet access and maps that are accessed can be stored in the favorites folder. Some of the most prominent features of MetroMaps are: - Users can access more than one hundred subway maps with one simple application. - The application offers a SearchBar that allows the user to type in the name of a city. - You can share subway maps by social networks or emails. - It is available in multiple languages. For a person who travels frequently on a global scale, MetroMaps is a necessity. Overall, MetroMaps is the traveler's companion and could prevent a user from getting lost when trying to find that new location!
release_text: Check MetroMaps Pro for a better version without ads! No more insterstitial at the opening and closing of the app.

description: Did you know that only female mosquitoes are able to bite human and animals? It’s because male mosquitoes are fed on flower nectar. Why do we need to stay away from mosquitos? Malaria alone kills an estimated 630,000 people a year, and incapacitates 200-million others for various length of time. Why use this app? Certain mosquitos are afraid of sound from their predators, like dragonflies. This app emits 24 KHz sound that most mosquitos don’t want to hear. Features: * Low Battery Consumption * Runs in Background

If you want to work in a Government office or agency here in the Philippines, Civil Service Eligibility is a requirement. To be eligible in civil service, one must take and pass the Civil Service Exam. Civil Service Exam Reviewer is an app that will help you pass the exam with less expenses in review centers. To wit, these are the questions’ categories included in this app: • Math o Word Problems and Operations o Data Sufficiency • Filipino o Kasing-kahulugan o Kasalungat o Mga Kawikaan o Wastong Gamit o Pagkilala sa Mali • Constitution • English o Clerical Operations o Synonyms o Antonyms o Single-Word Analogy o Double-Word Analogy o Identifying Errors o Correct Usage • Inductive Reasoning For more questions, please don’t hesitate to send me an email: jayson.tamayo2@gmail.com . If ever you don’t have the capacity to purchase online, I also provided alternative payment methods. Contact me for more details.

All the best of Italian Recipes are now here on Android! Access all the recipes on your phone offline - NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED! Italian Recipes are categorized into 10: Appetizers, Side Dishes, Desserts, Sandwiches, Lasagna, Manicotti, Pesto, Pizzas, Ravioli and Main Dishes. More recipes are coming!

Pinoy Recipe Book is a new Filipino Recipe app for people eager to learn how to cook authentic Philippine cuisines. It provides complete, simple and easy to follow cooking instructions for you to be able to prepare sought-after Filipino foods. Compared to other Recipe apps in the market, Pinoy Recipe Book has a very intuitive yet beautiful user interface and categorization. Every recipe is categorized according to its main ingredient. If you can’t find the Filipino recipe you want to cook, just use the search function to find it. Customer satisfaction is very important to us. We will strive harder to provide you with more recipes in the future. If you have any difficulties, comments and suggestions with Pinoy Recipe Book, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
release_text: Version 9: Removed Startapp SDK for compliance Version 1.5: We temporarily removed recipe thumbnails from the list to prevent other low-memory devices from crashing. What's new in version 1.4: Facebook Integration - Share your favorite recipe with your friends! Better Recipe Categorization - Recipes are furtherly categorized. Thumbnails - Each recipe has its own thumbnail in the list. +30 MORE RECIPES!!

description: How to Play Word Factory: Shake up your phone to randomly generate 25 letter cubes and make as many snaked words as you can for 3 minutes out of adjoining letters vertically, horizontally, diagonally and backwards without skipping or repeating any letters. This is best played with 3 to 6 players. The score depends on the number of letters in a word starting with 3 letters = 1 point and so on. If other players got the same word as yours, the word will be crossed out. Only words that no one found will score. NOTE: You will need a pencil and a paper to write down your answers.

Awesome back workout delivers the fitness benefits everyone wants: better posture, improved strength and mobility for day to day tasks all without a gym. Making use of highly effective exercises this well thought out set of routines, guides you through each workout with a set of instructions and video guides that you can perform at home. Take advantage of this incredible offering and start your workout now. Features: -Great workouts -Video Instructions -Diet Plan -User Friendly Interface -Motivational tips All the videos are included in the application so you won't need an Internet connection to watch them. Awesome Back let's you workout whenever and wherever you feel like it. Please feel free to give us feedback through the review system. Awesome Back can only get better with your help. Before you give us a bad review, please feel free to email us at jtmcorp35@gmail.com and let us know what we can be doing better. Check out our other apps! Awesome Abs, Arms, Chest, Legs and Shoulders!
release_text: - Add new workout mode called Freestyle. - General improvements and tweaks.

description: In an exciting game Gun fighter will walk around the factory of criminal tumultuous quarter. Scary? Hardly! This set just never win! But it Gunfighter.Very long soldier to sail. Team attacked pirate, trying to seize the ship and capture the whole team. Soldier applied the correct strategy and drove pirate ship. Since then a lot has changed for Gunfighter. Now the soldier in the infantry and working on one of the most serious armed structures of the city Gunfighter. Strategy is steep and excellent fights crime. Always wears a gunfighter. Gunfighter easily walk through the criminal quarter filled with dangerous soldiers. Shoot and purify a block from the crime!

*****Trivial Matemático***** Trivial Matemático es un juego gratis basado en las cuatro operaciones aritméticas básicas: * Suma * Resta * Multiplicación * División Trivial Matemático ayudará al niño a dominar rápidamente las operaciones y de forma divertida. Para más información y otras apps, prueba mi blog: http://mynewandroidapps.blogspot.com.es Trivial Matemático es la forma más sencilla de aprender y disfrutar de las matemáticas. Si te ha gustado este juego gratis, por favor evalualo y deja un comentario, así nos ayudarás a crear otros juegos similares. Trivial Mathematical ***** ***** Trivial Math is a free game based on the four basic arithmetic operations: * Sum * Resta * Multiplication * Division Mathematical Trivial help the child to quickly master the operations in a funny way. For more information and other apps, try my blog: http://mynewandroidapps.blogspot.com.es Trivial Math is the easiest way to learn and enjoy math. If you liked this game you free, please evaluate it and leave a comment and give us create similar games.

-- UPDATE! Sony have released a new SmartWatch 2 update on 14 January 2015 which FIXES the bugs introduced with the December update. The time and date should now display correctly on all JJW Watchfaces. Thanks for your patience and continued support! -- An original JJW watchface for the Sony(TM) SmartWatch 2. This watchface brings simplicity and digital time to your wrist! Like Us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfaces Be sure to checkout my other watchface creations for the Sony(TM) SmartWatch 2 and if you like this watchface, please consider giving me a good rating as it inspires me to come up with even better designs! Note: This is a native watchface/clock for the Sony(TM) SmartWatch 2 and works in active and low power mode to save your watch's battery. By using this watchface you should still continue to get the 3-5 day battery life from your watch unlike other 'pseudo-watchface apps' which chew through your battery. Installation instructions: 1. Download app via Google Play 2. Click the 'SmartWatch 2' notification in the notifications bar to open the SmartWatch 2 configuration app 3. Click 'Edit watch faces' button 4. Create a new watchface or edit an existing one 5. Click 'Clocks' 6. Choose the new watchface from the list of watchfaces 7. Enjoy! Further detailed instructions can be found on Sony's blog here: http://blogs.sonymobile.com/2014/04/22/smartwatch-2-400-apps-new-styles-and-new-features/ Please send me an email if you have troubles getting it to install and I'll do my best to help. Troubleshooting (watchface doesn't display or show up in the list of clocks after installing it from Google Play): 1. Turn off your watch and turn it back on 2. Turn off your phone and turn it back on 3. Turn off bluetooth on your phone and turn it back on 4. Create a new watchface template and see if you can add the new watchface. If this fails, you may need to take further steps. Continue to follow the steps below: 5. Uninstall the Sony(TM) Smart Connect app 6. Un-pair your SmartWatch with your phone 7. Reinstall the Sony(TM) Smart Connect app 8. Re-pair your SmartWatch with your phone 9. Follow steps 1-4 again. Thanks goes to Naheel from XDA forums for providing the guide on how to make custom watchfaces. Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 Smart extension for SmartWatch 2 clocks LiveWare extension for SmartWatch 2 Sony and the Sony logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Sony Corporation. This app is in no way associated with, endorsed by, or affiliated with, SONY or Sony Mobile.
